sentence.Network_en: They may feel tired and though outwardly calm, can be irritable.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们或许会感到疲惫，虽然外表看似没事，但可能很容易发火。

sentence.Network_en: Sara, while remaining outwardly amiable toward all concerned, was inwardly furious.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨拉尽管表面上对所有相关的人依然和蔼可亲，内心却怒火中烧。

sentence.Network_en: Through it all, Mark was outwardly calm.
sentence.Network_cn: 自始至终，马克表面上都显得很镇定。

802 rotate inwardly 内旋803 rotate outwardly 外旋804 rough 巨浪

all witnessed many outwardly successful and famous people who have not been able to find personal happiness . no amount of fame or fortune could fill the void they felt inside .我们看到很多表面上成功的名人并不幸福，因为没有任何的名声和财富可以填补他们内心的空虚。
he is a wolf in sheep's clothing , outwardly kind but inwardly vicious !他是个披着羊皮的狼，外貌仁慈，内心狠毒！

entry.def: You use outwardly to indicate the feelings or qualities that a person or situation may appear to have, rather than the ones that they actually have.

example.ex: They may feel tired and though outwardly calm, can be irritable...
example.tran: 他们或许会感到疲惫，虽然外表看似没事，但可能很容易发火。

example.ex: Outwardly this looked like the beginning of a terrific programme but the stage was actually set for a major disaster.
example.tran: 表面上，这似乎是开启了一个极棒的项目，但实际上却是为一场大的灾难埋下了伏笔。

auth_sentence.content: He was inwardly apprehensive as well as outwardly adventurous.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was inwardly apprehensive as well as outwardly adventurous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was inwardly apprehensive as well as outwardly adventurous.

auth_sentence.content: He said the letter wasn't outwardly suspicious.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said the letter wasn't outwardly suspicious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said the letter wasn't outwardly suspicious.

auth_sentence.content: Outwardly he is scarred, sarcastic and callous an inveterate brawler.
auth_sentence.res_content: Outwardly he is scarred, sarcastic and callous an inveterate brawler.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Outwardly he is scarred, sarcastic and callous an inveterate brawler.

sentences.cn: 表面上看，这对夫妻显得很幸福。

sentences.en: The brothers were outwardly friendly;inwardly they were far apart.
sentences.cn: 弟兄们表面上很友好,骨子里却很疏远。

sentences.en: Though very fierce outwardly,the dog was well-tamed.
sentences.cn: 这只狗虽然貌似凶猛,实际上是非常驯服的。
